s.text: The ITC has enlisted legal services attorneys from across the state to manage each of the 12 categories, and those volunteers will organize contributions and add them to a searchable database.
Anne Stalder Nelson, executive director of the Cabrini Green Legal Aid Clinic in Chicago, said the Web sites will serve as a resource that previously would have come at significant cost.
Anne Stalder Nelson, executive director of the Cabrini Green Legal Aid Clinic in Chicago, said the Web sites will serve as a resource that previously would have come at significant cost.
Anne Stalder Nelson, executive director of the Cabrini Green Legal Aid Clinic in Chicago, said the Web sites will serve as a resource that previously would have come at significant cost.
Anne Stalder Nelson, executive director of the Cabrini Green Legal Aid Clinic in Chicago, said the Web sites will serve as a resource that previously would have come at significant cost.

Nelson, a member of the ITC Board of Directors, also said the available training materials, the online calendar and the message boards will save a lot of time in getting new interns and volunteers up to speed.

Nelson, a member of the ITC Board of Directors, also said the available training materials, the online calendar and the message boards will save a lot of time in getting new interns and volunteers up to speed.
"As the director of a small legal aid clinic, this is huge for us -- it's giving us access to resources we wouldn't otherwise be able to afford," Nelson said. "
